name: Safari Grounds - The Wilpattu Leopard
description:
Mini open-world, first-person adventure & survival story of a wildlife photographer.

You have only one goal, Capture all the rare wild animals with your camera. You have no right to disturb or hurt them because this is their world, their home. The wild is not always friendly, be careful and be alert. Listen to the wind, listen to the trees they will guide you safely. At the end of the day before the dark you may return to your camp site safely.
